groups.name: fusionbrain
groups.description: Configuration properties for FusionBrain API integration.

properties.name: fusionbrain.enabled
properties.description: Whether FusionBrain API integration is enabled.

properties.name: fusionbrain.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for the FusionBrain API.

properties.name: fusionbrain.api-key
properties.description: API key required for authenticating requests.

properties.name: fusionbrain.api-secret
properties.description: API secret required for authenticating requests.

properties.name: fusionbrain.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests.

properties.name: fusionbrain.poll-interval
properties.description: Interval between polling attempts for asynchronous operations (in seconds).

properties.name: fusionbrain.async-core-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads for asynchronous operations.

properties.name: fusionbrain.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether SSL certificate validation is enabled.

properties.name: fusionbrain.ssl.truststore
properties.description: Path to a truststore file (classpath: or file: prefix)
